name: Sweets Cake
description:
Sweets Cake is very funny game with beautiful graphic candies cakes for kids , collect all sweet Candy and Cakes on the game , and avoid Bombe candies . this game is really fun for your kids and let them focus trying to avoid obstacle there.

Use familiar Graphic like Blue candy,red candy,yellow candy,Chocolate cake,strawberry cake,Blueberry cake and many more cake for you . Keep delicious game on your eye and play throgh the levels

Feel free to play candy best One tap game on your phone , and share score to your friends

Candy Jump Features :
- Easy To play
- Simple One Tap Gameplay
- Beautiful Graphic Candy
- Suitable for Kids who wants to play
- Beautiful Graphic Cake
- Fun Game with Many Levels
- Many Cake Available on game
- Many Candy Available on game

Play Sweets Cake for fun.
